titles.title: DAMS Act
Dam Assessment and Mitigation Support Act
DAMS Act
To amend the National Dam Safety Program Act to reauthorize certain assistance to States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management.
